question: Please analyze this URL https://hzt2yghexublm15r.pages.dev/smart89/
thought: I need to start by accessing the URL to obtain a status code. The website is accessible, so I should start by extracting the text from the HTML to look for any suspicious content. The text obtained from the website is not in English, which is unusual for a legitimate website. I should also extract the hyperlinks to see if there are any suspicious links. The lack of any hyperlinks on the website is suspicious. I should also retrieve domain name information from WHOIS to further investigate. The website has the following characteristics of a scam: 1. Unusual text in a language other than English. 2. Lack of hyperlinks on the website. 3. Domain information shows redacted registrant details, which is suspicious. - result: True

answer.reason: The website exhibits multiple characteristics of a scam website including unusual text in a non-English language lack of hyperlinks and redacted registrant details in the domain information.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
